patthana17.18:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
patthana17.18:0.3_0: Standing on the past, the basis of the happiness that are skillful.
patthana17.18:1.1_0: Passing the skillful, supported by the past, what is a condition for the arising.
patthana17.18:2.1_0: Femaculates the skillful supported by the ear ... the nose ... the tongue ... body ...
patthana17.18:3.1_0: Because of the skillful thoughts, supported by thought, the support is a cause.
